name: OntoMathPro
body:
### Welcome to OntoMathPro Ontology Page!
The OntoMathPro ontology has been developed by the [research group](https://github.com/CLLKazan) from Kazan Federal University (Russia). The ontology geared to be the hub for math knowledge in the Web of Data. We shared the sources with the Semantic Web community to engage our colleagues from elsewhere in its further development.

### How to Contribute?

1.  [Clone](https://github.com/CLLKazan/OntoMathPro/tree/develop) the **develop** branch.

2.  Edit **OntoMathPro.owl** using your favorite editor (e.g. [Protege](http://protege.stanford.edu/)) and save it in [OWL 2 Manchester Syntax](http://www.w3.org/TR/owl2-manchester-syntax/).

3.  [Create](https://github.com/CLLKazan/OntoMathPro/pulls) a pull request for the **develop** branch and send it.


### Support or Contact
Contact [our mailing list](https://groups.google.com/d/forum/ontomathpro).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
